remarks: A lemma for barycentric coordinates in one dimension.  (Contributed by BJ, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
bj-bary1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
bj-bary1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
bj-bary1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) $.
bj-bary1.neq $e |- ( ph -> A =/= B ) $.
bj-bary1lem $p |- ( ph -> X = ( ( ( ( B - X ) / ( B - A ) ) x. A ) + ( ( ( X - A ) / ( B - A ) ) x. B ) ) ) $.
